resources.string: "You can add your ingredients in two ways. One, you can take a picture with the camera at the bottom of the screen and the app will recognize the item for you. Two, you can take a look at our pantry page and manually type in your ingredients. After that, press the generate recipes button and type in your preferences like cuisine, diet, and meal type. Press the generate button and the app will generate recipes for you. Enjoy your food!"
